title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Special Update for Xbox - help Asobo resolve crashing issues
description:
Today a special update has been released which you will only receive if you join the beta program on the Xbox. The update is targeted to Xbox only and is released to investigate crashing issues on the Xbox Series X/S which started to occur after the last few updates. 

0:00 intro
0:10 what does the update do
1:50 joining the beta program
3:28 installing the update
3:53 ensure correct logging is enabled
5:20 leaving the beta program
